name: Darlene Watts
text: So sad this place is closing I love this place. When I moved here my son says mom I got to take you to this awesome store this awesome place and he brought me to Hastings and this is like his favorite store in Auburn and so is it for my other 2 kids too so it's a really sad that they're closing

name: Beau Helton
text: First 'Bodega' now Hastings is leaving!? This place was great. You could rent movies, return them earlier, and get credit. After a while you would build enough credit to get free rentals which seemed like a great prize! Great movie, video game, book, and music collection! Now they're going out of business...

name: Courtney Quinton
text: Really awesome store in the very rare chance they don't have what you are looking for they can order it within a few days for you and also they give the best deals on games I've ever seen in my life I just bought 8 movies and 5 PS3 games for 20 bucks

name: Jeffrey Wentz
text:
-OUT OF BUSINESS-
I never went here until they were closing for good, but there blow out sales were amazing! 60-80% off of everything was really nice while it lasted.

name: Pernell Moore
text: Great place to go for renting or buying movies, music, and video games. Big store with lots of comfortable chairs for you to lounge in.

name: Aaditya Madh
text: This doesnt exist anymore but it was pretty cool... kinda like ny social life

name: Danielle Jackson
text: Great place to buy movies!! Always have a great deals!!!

name: Jennifer Phillips
text: Closing down the only good movie store in Columbus, Ga and doesn't have a site that works. HIGHLY disappointed!

name: Justin Brown
text: Has the best deals and prices on movies. Period.

name: Noah Triplett
text: They have decent sales in records!

name: Daryl Bennett
text: Always having sales on used movies.  THAT'S IS BEST THING ABOUT THIS PLACE.

name: Dallan Healey
text: Fun place to look around at.

name: Brian Uthman
text: This store has everything and more!!! I can spend way too much time in here if I'm not careful.

name: Jessica vM (80jellyfish)
text: I just drove an hour to this store, as the phone line was only automated. It's closed. I wish they would've changed the phone message.

name: Gerson Pagan
text: If you are looking for Comics this was the place to go to. Sad to see you leave.

name: Ninja K
text: My little slice of heaven.

name: Kristopher Crump
text: Too bad it's gone, I liked looking around.

name: Savannah Hawkins
text: It's going out of business, so...

name: Brian Uthman
text: This store has everything and more!!! I can spend way too much time in here if I'm not careful.

name: Ninja K
text: My little slice of heaven.
